# Changelog

All notable changes to mkdocs-to-confluence are documented in [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/jmanteau/mkdocs-to-confluence/releases).

## Latest Release

**[View Latest Release →](https://github.com/jmanteau/mkdocs-to-confluence/releases/latest)**

## All Releases

**[View All Releases →](https://github.com/jmanteau/mkdocs-to-confluence/releases)**

Each release includes:
- New features and improvements
- Bug fixes
- Breaking changes (if any)
- Installation instructions
- Migration guides

## Release Notes Format

This project follows [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html):

- **Major** (1.0.0) - Breaking changes
- **Minor** (0.1.0) - New features, backward compatible
- **Patch** (0.0.1) - Bug fixes, backward compatible

## Stay Updated

- **Watch** the repository for release notifications
- **Star** the repository to show support
- **Subscribe** to release notifications on GitHub
